full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 467 Filed 11/15/21 Page 100 of 158
LBAAMAX3ps
Rocchio - Cross
1 A. I haven't tabulated them. I, I could make an estimate if you like, but I --
2 Q. Sure.
3 A. -- don't know for sure.
4 About 25.
5 Q. 25 hours.
6 And do you keep time records of what you do?
7 A. I do.
8 MR. PAGLIUCA: I'd ask for production of those time
9 records, your Honor.
10 It doesn't have to be today.
11 THE COURT: On what grounds?
12 MR. PAGLIUCA: Well, your Honor, it goes to the motive
13 and bias of the witness, as a financial gain through this
14 contract.
15 THE COURT: It's a perfectly acceptable question in
16 front of the jury. But what's your entitlement to the time
17 records?
18 MR. PAGLIUCA: So we know how much time she's spent on
19 this and what her anticipated compensation is.
20 THE COURT: I'm just asking, I mean, this sounds like
21 broad-reaching discovery. Under what rule or other authority
22 are you entitled to that?
23 MR. PAGLIUCA: I believe, your Honor, I'm entitled to
24 this under Brady and Giglio, because this is motive and bias
25 
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00007279
